title: Panda-Hook Destroy
description: This is the configuation object panda-hook needs to delete a repo from the hook-server

cluster_address.description: The hostname of the cluster.  Must specify user and port if not 22. <user>@<host_address>:<port>

repo_name.description: The name of the repository to be manipulated on the hook server.

hook_address.description: The hostname of the hook-server.  Must specify user and port if not 22. <user>@<host_address>:<port>

hook_source.description: The path of the githook template.

hook_name.description: The name of the githook to be manipulated.

launch_path.description: Relatvive path to target directory to scan for service names
